*[[Black Belt#Dungeons|Dungeons]] }} == Description == The '''Black Belt''' is a type of held item that can only be equipped to [[File:Fighting_Type_icon.png|30px]] Fighting type Pokémon. == Details == Raises attack of the Pokémon holding the item by 10%. == Acquisition == ===Dungeons=== {{Loot/head‎|Items}} {{LootItem|Mt Mortar|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Mt.
